name: Frightfur Dare-Devil
desc:
1 "Edge Imp" monster + 1 "Fluffal" monster
When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. If this card is destroyed by battle, or if this face-up card in its owner's control leaves the field because of an opponent's card effect: You can inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each "Frightfur" monster in your Graveyard. You can only use this effect of "Frightfur Dare-Devil" once per turn.
